http:
  routers:
    sophos-router-http:
      rule: Host(`sophos.bourne.cloud`)
      service: sophos-service
    sophos-router-https:
      rule: Host(`sophos.bourne.cloud`)
      service: sophos-service
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
  services:
    sophos-service:
      loadBalancer:
        serversTransport: insecureTransport
        servers:
          - url: "https://192.168.1.1:4444"
  serversTransports:
    insecureTransport:
      insecureSkipVerify: true
